message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product. I'm asking for $150 for it.  It's a great deal for you, and it's worth it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $100 is just too low for me. How about $130? That's still a good deal for you, and it's closer to what the product is worth to me.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. That's my best offer for now.
Bob, I understand your position. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $115? It's a fair price for both of us, and it's closer to what I need to make this deal work.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. How about $112? That's my best offer for now.
Bob, I'm really trying to make this work. I'm willing to go down to $113. That's my absolute lowest, and it's still a good deal for you. I'm confident you'll see the value in this product.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. How about $110? That's my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if it's not accepted.
